properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM REVIEW JOIN REGISTER USING(REG_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT REG_NO , TEACH_DATE , REG_STA , CL_THUMB , C.CL_NAME "CL_NAME" , S.START_TIME "START_TIME" , D.DISTR_NAME "DISTR_NAME" FROM REGISTER R LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.CL_NO = R.CL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN DISTRICT D ON D.DISTR_CODE = C.DISTR_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON S.SCH_NO = R.SCH_NO WHERE R.MEM_NO = ? AND REG_STA = 2 AND RE_ENROLL = 'N'
